languages.text: Молчаливый и серьезный Енхо Сон, чье слово столь же крепко, как рукопожатие.
The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.
languages.original_text: Молчаливый и серьезный Енхо Сон, чье слово столь же крепко, как рукопожатие.

traits.locale_text: The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.
The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.
The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.
The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.

languages.text: El taciturno y serio Young-ho Sohn, cuya palabra era tan firme como su apretón de manos.
languages.original_text: The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.

traits.locale_text: El taciturno y serio Young-ho Sohn, cuya palabra era tan firme como su apretón de manos.

languages.text: 沉默寡言、神情严肃的宋永和，他的声音就像他的握手一样坚定有力。
languages.original_text: The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.

traits.locale_text: 沉默寡言、神情严肃的宋永和，他的声音就像他的握手一样坚定有力。

languages.text: 寡黙で厳粛なソン・ヨンホ、その言葉は握手と同じくらいしっかりしたものだった。
languages.original_text: The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.

traits.locale_text: 寡黙で厳粛なソン・ヨンホ、その言葉は握手と同じくらいしっかりしたものだった。

languages.text: Der schweigsame und stets ernste Young-ho Sohn, dessen Wort ebenso viel gilt wie sein Handschlag.
languages.original_text: The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.

traits.locale_text: Der schweigsame und stets ernste Young-ho Sohn, dessen Wort ebenso viel gilt wie sein Handschlag.

languages.text: Young-ho Sohn, un homme taciturne et sérieux dont la parole était aussi ferme que sa poignée de main.
languages.original_text: The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.

traits.locale_text: Young-ho Sohn, un homme taciturne et sérieux dont la parole était aussi ferme que sa poignée de main.

languages.text: Eli de karakteri de oldukça güçlü, sükûti ve haşmetli Young-ho Sohn.
languages.original_text: The taciturn and grave Young-ho Sohn, whose word was as firm as his handshake.

traits.locale_text: Sükûti ve haşmetli Young-ho Sohn. Eli de karakteri de oldukça güçlüydü.
